title: Client Disappears After "Launch"
body: So I open up the client and I get to the front page where it shows the free champion rotation roster, patch notes and other stuff. On top is a big yellow button that says "LAUNCH". When I click it to enter into the login page it just doesn't load up? I left the computer for almost 30 minutes and the second page just never loads. I've tried to load on a different region but that also didn't work. Help please :x

replies.body: Yup tried admin, didn't change anything unfortunately. Uhh OS is Windows 7 and I'm with Optus

so you know try deleting this RADS\projects\lol_launcher file and start it from start up
sometimes you just need to refresh the client i ran into this problem before

For future reference, use the "Reply" feature to reply to others. This isn't the forums, they won't get notified of any responses made in the manner you have done this message in.

You can try two things from here. 1. [Use another DNS.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) 2. Reset your Internet Options to their defaults and then set security to Medium-Low.
Have you tried running it in admin mode? What OS and ISP are you on?
